name: Calgary Drone Simulator
description:
A drone simulator set in an accurate model of downtown Calgary built using real-world satellite data. Includes a mini-game in which you collect coins from 5 landmark locations.

I made the map from Google Maps 3D data using MapsModelsImporter by Elie Michel. I used the drone model and physics scripts from this tutorial by Indie-Pixel.

This is not meant to be an accurate simulation, instead just a prototype to practice my skills and explore what can be done using satellite data. I plan to continue working on this project so view this project's GitHub repo for more info.
